evidence_assessment: not required to make explicit findings on every piece of evidence
presumed to have considered all submitted documents
decision_reasoning: Board referenced Dr. King's second report but not the first
Board stated it carefully evaluated all previous decisions
discretion_exercise: Board was not obligated to accept Dr. King's opinion over others
cause_of_action: Applicant sought disability pension based on knee injury during service
claim was repeatedly denied due to lack of connection between injury and current condition
procedure_followed: Judicial review under Federal Court Act challenging Board's decision as erroneous due to disregard of Dr. King's opinions
